Package csb :: Package bio :: Package io :: Module wwpdb :: Class SparseChainSequence

Class SparseChainSequence

source code

               object --+        
                        |        
sequence.AbstractSequence --+    
                            |    
       sequence.ChainSequence --+
                                |
                               SparseChainSequence

Sequence view for reference (SEQRES) or sparse (ATOM) PDB chains. The residue instances passed to the constructor must be csb.bio.structure.Residue or csb.bio.io.wwpdb.ResidueInfo objects.

See csb.bio.sequence.AbstractSequence for details.
